definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion therapy is an effective method for acute gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 结论中医灸法治疗痛风性关节炎急性期疗效确切。

sentences.english: Postoperative septic arthritis is an uncommon complication after anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 前叉重建后感染性关节炎是一种罕见的并发症。

sentences.english: This article will summarize the relationship between the markers of cartilage collagens and osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 本文对软骨胶原标志物与骨性关节炎的关系作一综述。

sentences.english: However, arthritis will usually begin and result in lameness a few months later.
sentences.chinese: 然而，关节炎通常会开始和跛行导致数个月后。

sentences.english: It is used to treat rheumatism and enuresis of children as a folk medicine in China.
sentences.chinese: 民间多用于治疗风湿性关节炎和小儿遗尿症。

sentences.english: Rheumatoid arthritis is a painful condition that affects your joints.
sentences.chinese: 风湿性关节炎是影响关节令人痛苦的疾病。

sentences.english: About one in five adults has arthritis or chronic joint pain.
sentences.chinese: 大约有五分之一的成年人患有关节炎或慢性关节痛。

sentences.english: To observe talcum's effect on arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 观察滑石对关节炎效能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the procedure and effect on treating septic arthritis of temporomandibular joint (TMJ).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨化脓性颞下颌关节炎的治疗方法及其疗效。

sentences.english: Degenerative osteoarthritis tends to occur on weight-bearing joints and afflicts life quality significantly.
sentences.chinese: 退化性关节炎好发于负重的关节，影响生活品质甚巨。

sentences.english: Conclusion the therapeutic effect of sodium hyaluronate on articular genu osteoarthritis is preferable.
sentences.chinese: 结论透明质酸钠治疗膝关节骨性关节炎效果较好。

sentences.english: A "hot" joint that is swollen and tender may indicate an acute suppurative arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 肿且有压痛的“热”关节可能提示急性化脓性关节炎。

sentences.english: It will be effective for the arthritis and the osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 黑升麻常用于关节炎和骨质疏松症。

sentences.english: This is when only one side of the knee has been damaged by osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 这是当只有一方的膝盖已经损害了骨关节炎。

sentences.english: Generation II USA, Inc. - osteoarthritis bracing.
